questions.question: Simplify the following expression: 3/4 + 1/2
approaches: Find a common denominator before adding
Think about the parts of a whole when adding fractions

questions.question: Find a common denominator for the following fractions: 2/5, 3/8, and 1/10
reasons: Struggle with finding the least common multiple
Mistakes may occur due to adding fractions with different denominators
approaches: Identify the smallest number that all denominators can divide into
Scaffold by breaking down each denominator into prime factors

questions.question: Compare the following fractions: 2/3 and 5/6. Use <, >, or = to show your answer.
reasons: Difficulty in comparing fractions with different denominators
approaches: Convert fractions to have a common denominator for comparison
Visualize the fractions on a number line to understand their relative sizes
